簭字的基本解释

簭
shì
古同“噬”，咬。
古同“筮”。

簭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shì］
［《廣韻》時制切，去祭，禪。］
(1)同“筮”。用蓍草占卦。
(2)通“噬”。咬。

簭字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　簭； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页901第08
【字彙補】與筮同。【周禮·春官】簭人，中士二人。【註】問蓍曰筮，其占易。又簭人，掌三《易》以辨九簭之名：一曰《連山》，二曰《歸藏》，三曰《周易》。九簭之名：一曰巫更，二曰巫咸，三曰巫式，四曰巫目，五曰巫易，六曰巫比，七曰巫祠，八曰巫參，九曰巫環，以辨吉凶。【註】此九巫皆當爲筮之誤。　又噬也。【周禮·冬官考工記】凡攫閷援簭之類。【註】簭者，以口噬物而食也。

簭字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
簭字的起名意思

暂无。

簭
Basic explanation of words
簭
shì
Gu Tong "bites" and bites.
The ancient same "drinks".
簭
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shì］
["Guangyun" time cut, go to sacrifice, Zen. ]
(1) Same as "筮". Use yarrow to divine hexagrams.
(2) Through "cheating". bite.
簭
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo characters department] 　簭; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 901 08
【Word Supplement】Same as Jing. 【Zhou Li·Chunguan】The sergeant and the sergeant. [Note] Asking Xun said that it is easy to occupy it. Another 簭ren, palm three "Yi" to distinguish the name of the nine 簭: one is "Lianshan", the second is "Gui Zang", and the third is "Zhou Yi". The name of the nine 簭: one is witches, the second is witch salt, the third is witch style, the fourth is witch eye, the fifth is witch change, the sixth is witch bi, the seventh is witch temple, the eight is witch ginseng, and the nine is witch ring. To distinguish good from bad. [Note] These nine witches are all regarded as the fault of the scorpion.　 Also bite again. 【Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji】Fan 攫閷aid 簭 and the like. [Note] The 簭 person eats something with the mouth.
簭
